website_summaries.verdict: If you are looking for a tactical pen and budget is a priority, it's a good choice – but others have more functions and sturdier designs.
pros: Has excellent qualities for a fraction of the price of competitors, including a sleek, silver-tone finish, military-grade aluminum craftsmanship, and waterproof pen
cons: Lacks the heft of others on our shortlist

customer_reviews.title: First Cartridge and clip is way under quality standards.
customer_reviews.text: The first day of using the pen. The overall look of the pen is great!!! Has great weight and balance. As for the clip, it is very under par. It came loose the first time I put it in my pocket. The first pen cartridge lasted about 15 words while I was in a corporate safety audit. I am on the second cartridge now. I hope it lasts longer than the first one. I am going to request new cartridges form the seller
customer_reviews.author: Calvin Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Quality, build, form.
customer_reviews.text: This pen here offers a quality that's second to none, the build of it is great as well the cap side giving you a nice flat surface and the bottom a point and yes it will make a point if necessary. I like how the point is not extreme so to not "permanently damage" a individual but can still make them submit. You can still use this as a writing pen as well it comes with a second ink refill cartage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Threads failed after light office use
customer_reviews.text: Threads failed after light office use. This pen was used only for writing in the office. It was used lightly (less than 10 times). The body of the pen that holds the cartridge inside will no longer screw together. I never tried to change the cartridge. It just came apart while writing in a meeting.
customer_reviews.author: Foghorn Leghorn

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Excellent tool for the price. I like the fact that the spring clip is held on by screws. I lost my last tactical pen when the top (which screwed to the bottom) unscrewed and fell off, leaving the pen in my pocket, but virtually useless as it could no longer be clipped to gear or pocket. Dirt cheap and good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good to have
customer_reviews.text: Actually looks good and now in the truck. 4 stars due to the fact that I have not tried to break a window with it and truly hope that that never happens. But well packaged and the unit appears fine.
customer_reviews.author: Berkshire484

customer_reviews.title: Not to heavy, very durable.
customer_reviews.text: Pin writes nice and smooth. Really like the cap, instead of clicking. Gave only 4 stars because the cap will not stay in place on back of pin.
customer_reviews.author: Troy

customer_reviews.title: The cap does not snap off it unscrews.
customer_reviews.text: I was unhappy about having to unscrew the cap instead of it being able to just pull it off and snap it on the opposite end. It makes it less tactful to use.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Walker Red

customer_reviews.title: carry it every day
customer_reviews.text: Like this product a lot. my only negative feedback it sometimes the time loosens and I have to screw it back on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is dangerious to carry.
customer_reviews.text: Unprotected point on back of pen is overkill... and sharp!
customer_reviews.author: Secret Squirrel

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Great build
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Great build. Pen works great and came with a refill. The glass breaker end may poke a whole in some pockets but will do its job on glass or as a self defense tool! Wish it was mat black. Would order again.
customer_reviews.author: SJM

customer_reviews.title: Exploding Ink Cartridge
customer_reviews.text: Can I give this zero stars? Nope. The ink cartridge exploded on first use, completely ruining a $95.00 shirt. I'll try to return the pen, but I'm totally screwed on the shirt. Extremely disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, high quality pen that allows a person to write with ease in any kind of weather conditions.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Brandenburg

customer_reviews.title: The clip has sprung within a month
customer_reviews.text: I had it in my pocket for a month just past the return date, lol.....the clip sprung....now instead of a tactical pen I have a new addition to my garbage can.
customer_reviews.author: Robert A Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: The cap doesn't snap onto the other end of the pen.
customer_reviews.author: Mml2050

customer_reviews.title: Looks like a very high end writing instrument
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with the Self Defense Tactical Pen! Looks like a very high end writing instrument, but could make the difference in keeping me safe in an emergency situation. Mind you, I hope it never happens, but will keep this little tool handy just in case. By the way, this would be a really thoughtful gift for any adult...even comes in a very nice gift box!
customer_reviews.author: Hot in the South

customer_reviews.title: Nice, solid pen.
customer_reviews.text: Nice, solid pen. Can probably be counted on to give that extra burst of penetration to get that yogurt container open! Just a little bit short to be a truly world class back scratcher, depending on where you itch. As a weapon, hell, if I'm close enough for it to matter, I'm screwed. Best bet is to chuck it at Mr. Evil's eyes and take off running as fast as you can!
customer_reviews.author: BacchusTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Love his Tactical Pen
customer_reviews.text: Love his Tactical Pen! Been wanting to get one for a while. It writes just fine(don't know what the other guy was saying) not heavy, which makes it very comfortable to carry. Great Pen! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Jon E.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome deal. High quality!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality for the price. Well made pen. Couldn't ask for a better deal.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great as a weapon not as a pen
customer_reviews.text: The casing is well made and holds up very well. However, the ballpoint inserts are rather poor so don't count on this being your go to pen even for the smallest of writting tasks. I would have expected a little better for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Gaviria

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: I like it l! It is pretty light but you know it is there. Writes well just needed to get the ball rolling. The only thing wrong is that it has a blues color that you don’t see in the pictures and I guess it’s not bad just wish it was silver. Good pen though!
customer_reviews.author: Fz09er

customer_reviews.title: A Joke Don't waste your time or money!
customer_reviews.text: This is a absolute fraud of a product you couldn't use this to break a window unless you put your whole hand through the window. Then if you did that why would you need this? It has no mechanism to power it or to propel it through glass or does it have enough weight to force it through weighting only 37 grams which is 1ounce 5 grams. Plus it doesn't even write well a joke even for 6.00 it's a waste!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sojar

customer_reviews.title: I would have given it a 1. 5 star ...
customer_reviews.text: I would have given it a 1.5 star if it was inscribed Tactical pen instead of Senior Tactical. I think this pen is too heavy for a senior to be carrying around for self-defense.
customer_reviews.author: Michael f. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Nice packaging, Writes well a subtle way to have a little added protection with you.
customer_reviews.text: I am a Realtor and always thinking about safety but don't want to carry something big and noticeable when meeting clients. This pen is perfect for giving me a little added protection without the client knowing I even have it. It is actually a pen with a second job. I can see how you can use this in a soft spot (eye, neck) to hurt an attacker and get away from them. It writes nicely too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars!
customer_reviews.text: I like it. It's a great pen and self defense weapon.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: This is an interesting little pen. First thing to note, is the aesthetic of the pen. It reminds me a bit of the style used for random items on the Original Star Trek, sleek with minimalist accents. This pen's hard as hell, I tried my darned to bend it against various objects. I must say, I believe the claim it's crafted from aircraft grade aluminum. Can't comment on breaking glass yet, no need to put it to use yet thankfully.
customer_reviews.author: Carrion Nevermore

customer_reviews.title: Very well made and even works as a real ink ...
customer_reviews.text: Very well made and even works as a real ink pen. It's heavier than I thought it would be, but that a plus. My only complaint is that I wish it had come with a chart showing where some of the pressure points are located.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Pluhar

customer_reviews.title: Nice design for a defense pen
customer_reviews.text: This is the defense pen you want to buy.....why?........because it has a level (smoothe) top to put your thumb to apply pressure. Most of these types of pens have a sharp top that does not give you that advantage! Buy this!!!
customer_reviews.author: CCC

customer_reviews.title: I love a good writing pen and this one wrote beautifully ...
customer_reviews.text: I love a good writing pen and this one wrote beautifully straight out of the box. I didn't even have to scribble to get it started. The weight is very nice too. It's a solid piece of metal. Will definitely buy another.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: High quality discrete self defense weapon!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this pen for my wife for protection while walking the dog. She loves the fact of how discrete and portable it is. It comes extremely well packaged with a nice showcase box to show it off. It fits comfortably in small and large hands. Im very happy with my purchase. I would recommend this to anyone looking for a nice discrete form of self defense.
customer_reviews.author: Botzilla

customer_reviews.title: Must Have!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to train my fiance how to take care of herself. She is a teacher, and it is important to be able to hide an effective weapon in plain sight. It is always good to have an option.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Bohica

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Awsome product beter then expected i didnt recognize its an actual pen too lol i love it great seller n product 5*
customer_reviews.author: AmazonAddiction

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to get it to write
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting something a little heavier and more metal but this appears to be just fine. The ink is a little difficult to start. It after some time it's fine. Are there other products out there that are better? Probably
customer_reviews.author: Johnny M
